log-manager.title: Log Management System
log-manager.description: Comprehensive logging platform for enterprise applications with real-time monitoring and alerting capabilities.
log-manager.problem: Scattered logs across multiple services made debugging and monitoring extremely difficult for development teams.
log-manager.solution: Built a centralized logging system with REST API integration and real-time dashboard for streamlined monitoring.
log-manager.outcome: Reduced debugging time by 70% and improved system visibility across all development teams.
log-manager.highlights_0: RESTful API built with ASP.NET Core for high-performance data ingestion.
log-manager.highlights_1: Real-time email alerting system with configurable thresholds and notifications.

anime-tracker.title: Anime Tracking App
anime-tracker.description: Personal anime tracking application with API integration for discovering and organizing anime watchlists.
anime-tracker.problem: Anime enthusiasts struggled to keep track of their viewing progress across multiple series and discover new content.
anime-tracker.solution: Created an intuitive tracking app with Jikan API integration for comprehensive anime data and personalized lists.
anime-tracker.outcome: Delivered a responsive system with high user engagement and positive community feedback.
anime-tracker.highlights_0: Integration with Jikan API for real-time anime data and comprehensive series information.
anime-tracker.highlights_1: Personalized dashboard with custom watchlists, favorites, and progress tracking features.
anime-tracker.highlights_2: Modern React and TypeScript implementation with optimized performance and responsive design.

expense-gov.title: Government Expense Tracker
expense-gov.description: Public transparency dashboard transforming government spending data into accessible visualizations.
expense-gov.problem: Complex government spending data remained inaccessible to citizens, limiting transparency and civic engagement.
expense-gov.solution: Developed an interactive visualization platform using Next.js and Chart.js for clear data presentation.
expense-gov.outcome: Increased public engagement with government data and received positive feedback from transparency advocates.
expense-gov.highlights_0: Interactive data visualizations using Chart.js for clear spending pattern analysis.
expense-gov.highlights_1: Fully responsive and accessible interface following WCAG guidelines for public use.
expense-gov.highlights_2: Python-based data processing pipeline for automated government dataset updates.

dolly-rebrand.title: Vintage Brand Redesign
dolly-rebrand.description: Complete visual identity renovation balancing nostalgic heritage with contemporary design appeal.
dolly-rebrand.problem: Outdated visual identity failed to attract younger demographics while losing connection with brand heritage.
dolly-rebrand.solution: Redesigned complete brand system including logo, color palette, and typography with modern sensibilities.
dolly-rebrand.outcome: Successfully balanced nostalgia with contemporary appeal, achieving strong market reception and increased shelf presence.
dolly-rebrand.highlights_0: Comprehensive visual system redesign maintaining brand heritage while modernizing appeal.
dolly-rebrand.highlights_1: Premium packaging redesign with focus on shelf impact and consumer connection.
dolly-rebrand.highlights_2: Complete digital design system documentation created in Figma for consistent implementation.
